summary: The implementation successfully addresses all three requirements. REQ-1 (color theme update) is fully implemented with a modern deep teal + coral + rich purple palette in index.css and tailwind.config.js. REQ-2 (dashboard redesign) is comprehensively implemented in DashboardPage.tsx with gradient headers, enhanced metric cards with glow effects, and modern table styling. REQ-3 (layout component updates) is fully implemented in AppLayout.tsx with modernized navigation and SignedOutScreen.tsx with sophisticated landing page design. All changes maintain existing functionality as required by the constraints.

hallucinated_features.description: Extensive redesign of SignedOutScreen.tsx landing page with decorative background elements, gradient hero section, and feature cards with hover animations
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only mentions updating authenticated app components (dashboard, layout, navigation). The SignedOutScreen is a pre-authentication landing page not mentioned in any requirement. While it uses the new color theme, the extensive visual redesign of this component was not requested.
